abstracts.cdata!:
The project's main objective is to
            assist the newly established Government institution,
            FINAPRI, to help generate both public and private sector
            investment projects. It provides for the funding of: (a)
            consultant's services to prepare high priority
            investment projects in key productive and social sectors;
            and (b) technical assistance to FINAPRI and its borrowers.
            The project does not involve any special risk other than the
            risks of possible delays in implementation which may arise
            due to FINAPRI's lack of experience.
